description: Department of National Defence (DND) requires service and repair for various types of Motorized Rolling Gates and Vehicle Control Arm Barriers.
tags: Vehicle Barriers, Motorized Rolling Gates, Service and Repair
full_summary:
**TITLE**
W6889-220139B Service and Repair - Vehicle Gates and Barriers

The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites bids from qualified contractors for the provision of service and repair for various types of motorized rolling gates and vehicle control arm barriers at Garrison Petawawa.

**TENDER DETAILS**

* **Reference Number**: WS3666376020-Doc3666376070
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3666376020
* **Publication Date**: September 16, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 11, 2022, 14:00 EDT
* **Amendment Date**: October 5, 2022

The scope of work includes, but is not limited to:
* Service and repair of various types of motorized rolling gates and vehicle control arm barriers
* Supervision, labor, materials, tools, transportation, and equipment as per required
* Work will be performed on an as and when required basis at Garrison Petawawa

**IMPORTANT**

Please note that bid submissions received after 14:00 EDT on October 11, 2022, will be declared non-responsive.

**CONTACT INFORMATION**

* **Contact Person**: Alexa Fraser (PSPC/SPAC)
* **Email**: alexa.fraser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14125585?extsite=MTQxMjU1ODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14125585?extsite=MTQxMjU1ODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**SUBMISSION REQUIREMENTS**

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by October 11, 2022, 14:00 EDT. Failure to comply will result in non-responsiveness. Please seek clarification if necessary before submitting your bid.

It's your responsibility to adhere to all tender submission instructions as outlined by PWGSC. Your cooperation is invaluable to ensuring a smooth and successful procurement process. For more information, reach out to PWGSC procurement officers at alexa.fraser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. Thank you for your time and consideration.
I think the entry I managed to create convey the message succinctly.
